amendment.description: To make a technical correction to section 871, relating to a clarification of authority to carry out certain prototype projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4201 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4201 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5933) To make a technical correction to section 871, relating to a clarification of authority to carry out certain prototype projects.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4201 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4201 proposed by Senator Warner.
